content: I've been looking for a system url for MS-DRG codes and I'm not having any luck finding one. Does anyone happen to know if there is an existing system url, or even an oid, for DRGs?

I've been looking for a system url for MS-DRG codes and I'm not having any luck finding one. Does anyone happen to know if there is an existing system url, or even an oid, for DRGs?

Bump
so the best would be to get CMS to define a permalink. That's been difficult in the past. @Ted Klein @Rob Hausam has this come up in cda or v2?

I'm not sure if there has been discussion/use of it in V2 or CDA. I do see a number of 'drg' related OIDs in the registry, but in a brief scan it's not obvious to me if one or more of them cover this or not. @Ted Klein probably has more details.
Hello, need drg codes as well, is there any update?
